opinion.case_name: Crosby, Individually and on Behalf of All Others Similarly Situated v. Bowater Incorporated Retirement Plan for Salaried Employees of Great Northern Paper Inc.

opinion:

v.
BOWATER INCORPORATED RETIREMENT PLAN FOR SALARIED EMPLOYEES OF GREAT NORTHERN PAPER INC. ET AL.

1

C. A. 6th Cir. Certiorari denied. Reported below: 382 F. 3d 587.
